description: WebHookTrigger is a trigger that gets invoked using a webhook type of post

allowEnv.description: allowEnv determines whether the webhook can set environment variables; can only be set to true for GenericWebHook.

secret.description: secret used to validate requests. Deprecated: use SecretReference instead.

secretReference.description: secretReference is a reference to a secret in the same namespace, containing the value to be validated when the webhook is invoked. The secret being referenced must contain a key named "WebHookSecretKey", the value of which will be checked against the value supplied in the webhook invocation.
